remarks: The set of dilations for a fiducial atom ` D ` .  (Contributed by NM, 4-Feb-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
dilset.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
dilset.s $e |- S = ( PSubSp ` K ) $.
dilset.w $e |- W = ( WAtoms ` K ) $.
dilset.m $e |- M = ( PAut ` K ) $.
dilset.l $e |- L = ( Dil ` K ) $.
dilsetN $p |- ( ( K e. B /\ D e. A ) -> ( L ` D ) = { f e. M | A. x e. S ( x C_ ( W ` D ) -> ( f ` x ) = x ) } ) $.
$d D f x $.
$d K f x $.
$d M f $.
$d S x $.
